original: ** MAP BY Hannibal [SPA] (Rafuron) **
zh_trans: ** 地图作者 汉尼拔 Hannibal [西班牙] (Rafuron)(翻译:星荧铃) **

original: ** Thanks to Kaemon **
zh_trans: ** 感谢 Kaemon **

original: ** This is the first round. Wait for more players to restart round or suicide. **
zh_trans: ** 这是第一回合。等待更多玩家加入来重新开始这一轮或选择放弃。**

original: ** WARMUP ROUND **
zh_trans: ** 热身回合**

original: ** Tip 1 : press +use on pickable objects to build barricades **
zh_trans: ** 提示 1：可拾取的物体按“E”键来建造障碍物，如果不知道怎么用请不要乱用 **

original: ** Tip 2 : reach and win the end of a stage to level up **
zh_trans: ** 提示 2：到达终点并通关的人会自动提升一级 **

original: ** Tip 3 : take items at zombie and human shops in spawn **
zh_trans: ** 提示 3：等级可用于在出生点的僵尸商店和人类商店获取神器或皮肤**

original: ** WARMUP ROUND ** ROUND RESTART IN 60 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 热身回合** ** 60 秒后重新开始回合**

original: ** Tip 4 : your current level is always displayed on new rounds or your kill score divided by 100 approximately **
zh_trans: ** 提示 4：当前等级通常会在回合开始时显示，也可通过按TAB分数面板，将自己的“得分”除以100，即为当前等级。**

original: ** Tip 5 : barricades health depends on the size and material **
zh_trans: ** 提示 5：障碍物的生命值取决于其大小和种类 **

original: ** Tip 6 : hold spots tend to be long * hold as much as possible at previous positions **
zh_trans: ** 提示 6：防守时间往往是较久的 * 尽可能不要贴门防守 **

original: ** Tip 7 : guards work as stoppers * but you can shoot throught them **
zh_trans: ** 提示 7：守卫能阻挡僵尸 * 且不会挡子弹 **

original: ** Tip 8 : the ladder and bomb items are powerful items * you must kill these zombies the first! **
zh_trans: ** 提示 8：梯子和TNT是很强的僵尸神器 * 必须随时注意他们的动向！**

original: ** Tip 9 : you must put the barricades BEHIND the guards to get maximum efficacy **
zh_trans: ** 提示 9：你可以将障碍物放置在守卫的后面，以获得最大的功效 **

original: ** Tip 10 : horse and armor (while shield is not broken) items can push zombies **
zh_trans: ** 提示 10：骑兵和重甲的护盾未被破坏时，可以推动僵尸**

original: ** Tip 11 : Balrog scream heals near zombies and increases speed temporally **
zh_trans: ** 提示 11：炎魔的咆哮可以治疗附近的僵尸，并暂时提高他们的移动速度**

original: ** Tip 12 : the stage 4 WC is in the top of the second tower (turn right after the wooden ramp) **
zh_trans: ** 提示 12：第四关的厕所位于第二座塔的顶部（在木斜坡后右转）**

original: ** Tip 13 : Gandalf +You shall not pass!+ is DAWDS and White Knight is AADDSWSW **
zh_trans: ** 提示 13：甘道夫大招的操作是 DAWDS，高达大招的操作是 AADDSWSW**

original: ** WARMUP ROUND ** ROUND RESTART IN 10 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 热身回合 ** 回合将在 10 秒后重新开始 **

original: ** WARMUP ROUND IS OVER! **
zh_trans: ** 热身结束! **

original: ** STARTING AT FIRST LEVEL! **
zh_trans: ** 从第一关开始！**

original: **CURRENT STAGE >> PART 1 >> OSGILIATH **
zh_trans: ** 当前关卡 >> 第一关 >> 奥斯吉力亚斯 **

original: ** THE ROUND WILL START IN FEW SECONDS ** CHECK YOUR LEVEL AND PROCEED TO BUY AN ITEM **
zh_trans: ** 回合即将开始 ** 检查您的等级并前往商店获得神器 **

original: ** THE ROUND HAS STARTED ** TAKE ONE OF THE PORTALS ** MASSIVE TELEPORTATION IN 20 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 回合已开始 ** 选择一个传送门 ** 20 秒后进行传送 **

original: ** THE BOATS ARE COMMING ** PREPARE YOURSELVES **
zh_trans: ** 船来了 ** 做好准备 **

original: ** RESIST 25 SECONDS! **
** RETREAT !! RIVER ZONE IS LOST **
zh_trans: ** 撤退！！河流区域失守了 **

original: ** WATCH OUT! WE ARE UNDER SIEGE **
zh_trans: ** 小心！我们正被围攻 **

original: ** DEFEND OSGILIATH! WE ARE NOT LEAVING THIS PLACE WITHOUT FIGHT! (30 SECONDS)**
zh_trans: ** 保卫奥斯吉力亚斯！我们绝不会不战而退！(30 秒)**

original: ** OSGILIATH IS LOST ** RETREAT ! **
zh_trans: ** 奥斯吉力亚斯失守 ** 撤退！**

original: ** TAKE THE HORSES **
zh_trans: ** 骑上那些马 **

original: ** DOOR IS OPENING **
zh_trans: ** 门正在打开 **

original: ** ZOMBIES ARE COMMING! CLOSE THE DOOR! **
zh_trans: ** 僵尸来了！把门关上！**

original: ** DOOR IS CLOSED **
zh_trans: ** 门已关闭 **

original: ** KILL THE REMAINING ZOMBIES! **
zh_trans: ** 杀死剩余的僵尸！**

original: ** STAGE COMPLETED **
zh_trans: ** 关卡完成 **

original: **CURRENT STAGE >> PART 2 >> MAIN GATES **
zh_trans: ** 当前关卡 >> 第二关 >> 米那斯提力斯主城门 **

original: ** THIS IS OUT OF CONTROL! RETREAT NOW ! **
zh_trans: ** 战况已失控！快撤退！ **

original: ** ORCS HAVE IRRUPTED THROUGH OUR DEFENSES ** RETREAT **
zh_trans: ** 兽人已经冲破了我们的防线 ** 撤退 **

original: ** WATCH OUT! **
** SIEGE TOWERS HAVE BEEN SET UP ** WE HAVE LOST THE WALLS ** RETREAT **
zh_trans: ** 兽人已架设攻城塔 ** 我们失去了城墙的控制权 ** 撤退 **

original: ** RETREAT! **
** THIS IS THE LAST STAND AT FIRST LEVEL ** FIGHT UNTIL THE SIGNAL **
zh_trans: ** 背水一战 ** 战斗至号角信号出现！ **

original: ** USE THE BARRICADES TO LOCK THE GATES OR DEFEND 60 SECONDS ! **
zh_trans: ** 使用障碍物封住大门或坚守 60 秒！**

original: ** DOOR 2 LOCKED **
zh_trans: ** 2 号门已关闭 **

original: ** DOOR 1 LOCKED **
zh_trans: ** 1 号门已关闭 **

original: ** DOORS LOCKED **
zh_trans: ** 门都关上了 **

original: **CURRENT STAGE >> PART 3 >> CATAPULTS **
zh_trans: ** 当前关卡 >> 第三关 >> 投石机 **

original: ** THEY ARE TRYING TO GET IN ** SHOOT! **
zh_trans: ** 他们正试图进来 ** 开火！ **

original: ** THEY ARE IN! RETREAT! **
zh_trans: ** 他们进来了！撤退！ **

original: ** THE LIFT IS LEAVING IN 10 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 升降梯将在 10 秒后离开 **

original: ** GATES ARE CLOSED ** SOMEONE MUST PRESS THE LEVER **
zh_trans: ** 大门已关闭 ** 必须有人去拉动控制杆 **

original: ** THE LEVER HAS BEEN PRESSED ** THE GATE IS OPENING IN 10 SECONDS ! **
zh_trans: ** 控制杆已被拉下 ** 大门将在 10 秒后开启！**

original: ** USE THE CATAPULTS IN ORDER TO CONTINUE THE MINAS TIRITH DEFENSE! **
zh_trans: ** 利用投石机保卫米那斯提力斯！**

original: ** Catapult 2 activated **
zh_trans: ** 投石机 2 已启动 **

original: ** Catapult 1 activated **
zh_trans: ** 投石机 1 已启动 **

original: ** NICE DONE! METAL GATE WILL OPEN IN 10 SECONDS! **
zh_trans: ** 干得漂亮！门将在 10 秒后打开！**

original: ** PROTECT THE BUILDING UNTIL CIVILIAN EVACUATION! *
zh_trans: ** 在平民撤离前，守住这栋建筑！**

original: ** DEFEND THIS PLACE FOR 35 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 在此坚守 35 秒 **

original: ** WAIT FOR SOME SECONDS! OTHER SURVIVORS COULD COME **
zh_trans: ** 等几秒钟！可能会有其他幸存者过来 **

original: ** THE POSITION IS LOST ** RETREAT **
zh_trans: ** 这里失守了 ** 撤退 **

original: ** ALL GET IN!! ** PREPARE YOUR LAST DEFENSE **
zh_trans: ** 所有人都进来！！** 准备迎接最后的战斗 **

original: ** DEFEND THIS PLACE FOR 70 SECONDS! **
zh_trans: ** 在此坚守 70 秒！**

original: ** DOORS UNLOCKED ** RETREAT ! **
zh_trans: ** 门已解锁 ** 撤退！**

original: ** WE HAVE LOST THE POSTION ** FALL BACK **
zh_trans: ** 这个地方沦陷了 ** 撤退 **

original: ** STAGE 3 COMPLETED **
zh_trans: ** 第三关已完成 **

original: ** CURRENT STAGE >> PART 4 >> THE LAST STAND **
zh_trans: ** 当前关卡 >> 第四关 >> 背水一战 **

original: ** (LIBRARY) ** DOORS ARE UNLOCKED NOW **
zh_trans: ** （图书馆）** 门现在解锁了 **

original: ** (LIBRARY) ** HOLD HERE! ** WAIT UNTIL HORN SIGNAL! **
zh_trans: ** （图书馆）** 在这里坚守！** 等待号角响起！**

original: ** (DUNGEONS) ** HOLD UNTIL THE HORN SIGNAL **
zh_trans: ** （地牢）** 坚持到号角响起 **

original: ** (DUNGEONS) ** THE DOOR IS UNLOCKED NOW **
zh_trans: ** （地牢）** 门解锁了 **

original: ** FALL BACK! **
** WE ARE TRAPPED! FIGHT FOR YOUR LIVES! **
zh_trans: ** 我们被困住了！为生而战！ **

original: ** THE CEILING HAS COLLAPSED ** CLIMB THE BROKEN WALL! **
zh_trans: ** 天花板塌了 ** 快从破墙那里爬上去！（推荐从左边上去）**

original: ** WE ARE NEAR THE TOP OF MINAS TIRITH ** HOLD THIS PLACE FOR 30 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 我们已经接近米那斯提力斯的顶层了 ** 在此坚守 30 秒 **

original: ** LIFT IS LEAVING IN 10 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 升降梯将在 10 秒后离开 **

original: ** THE GHOST ARMY IS COMING! PREPARE YOURSELVES FOR THE LAST DEFENSE ! **
zh_trans: ** 亡灵大军要来了！做好最后的防御准备！**

original: ** DEFEND THE MAIN GATE IN ORDER TO CONTINUE THE DEFENSE AT TOP OF MINAS TIRITH ! **
zh_trans: ** 守住大门，为米那斯提力斯顶层防御争取更多时间！**

original: ** THE WAYS ARE OPENED ** REACH THE TOP OF MINAS TIRITH ** SURVIVE 90 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 道路已打开 ** 前往米那斯提力斯顶层 ** 生存 90 秒 **

original: ** THIS IS THE LAST POINT OF THE MAP ** SURVIVE THE REMAINING TIME **
zh_trans: ** 这是最后一个守点了 ** 活下来！ **

original: ** All humans at bottom part will die in 15 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 底部的人类 15 秒后将被处死**

original: ** THE WHITE KNIGHT IS READY ROCK THE WORLD**
zh_trans: ** 白骑士高达即将震撼世界 **

original: ** .. THE CREATURE OF SHADOW AND FIRE IS HERE ... **
zh_trans: ** .. 火焰与阴影中的恶魔在此降临 ... **

original: ** STAGE 4 COMPLETE ** STARTING AGAIN IN EXTREME MODE! **
zh_trans: ** 第四关完成！ ** 继续挑战 EX 关吧！**

original: ** EXTREME MODE : ON **
zh_trans: ** EX 关启动！ **

original: ** ENABLED BLUE COLORCORRECTION AND PARTICLES **
zh_trans: ** 启用了蓝色色彩校正和粒子效果 **

original: ** ALL ITEMS FOR ZOMBIE HAVE BEEN UNLOCKED BUT NOT LVL 5**
zh_trans: ** 五级以外的僵尸神器都已解锁 **

original: ** CONSTANT METEOR HAS BEEN ENABLED **
zh_trans: ** 战斗过程中请注意躲避脚下的红色天谴特效 **

original: ** INCREASED NUMBER OF NAZGULS **
zh_trans: ** 戒灵的数量增加了 **

original: ** LVL 0 PLAYERS LEVEL UP TO 1 AUTOMATICALLY **
zh_trans: ** 0 级的玩家自动升级到 1 级 **

original: ** KILL THE REMAINING ZOMBIES **
zh_trans: ** 杀死剩余的僵尸 **

original: ** THIS IS THE MOMENT OF THE TRUTH ** FIGHT LIKE YOU HAVE NEVER FIGHTED BEFORE! **
** UNLIMITED AMMO ON **
